Pune Data Center

Request Quote

TIER III Complaint with Carrier Neutral Facility

Web Werks state of the art data center in Pune, located in the business hub – Hinjewadi which is a great option if you are looking to move in, co-locate or outsource data center services. Our data center in Pune provides everything that you need to achieve operational excellence. To highlight few of the key features of our infrastructure, we own Tier III carrier-neutral data center, layered with sophisticated technologies that abide with best industry practices for optimum functionality. We offer mission-critical hosted products and services with a competitive edge.

Over the past decade, Web Werks has created a robust and stable network. Our data center located in Pune is our third data center in India and 5th globally after Mumbai, Navi Mumbai, Philadelphia and Conshohocken. Web Werks having state of the art Tier III Internet Data Centers in Pune. Our Data center facility has precision-controlled air conditions systems with incorporated redundancy.

We maintain constant power supply for all the equipment with secondary as well as tertiary backup systems to ensure NEAR TO ZERO downtime and unstoppable performance of the machines. Redundant network infrastructure is offered with best quality switches and routers. A multi-level security protocol with modern biometric systems, 24x7 CCTV surveillance etc. are deployed to repel off any illegitimate entry/threat.

Other major highlights of our Pune Data Center:

Carrier Neutral Data Center

Scalable Infrastructure

24 x 7 Rapid Action Team

Biometric scan entry system

VESDA Fire Alarm System

24 x 7 NOC Monitoring Team

Uninterrupted power supply

Environmental Monitoring Systems

Cisco Network Security

Constant Surveillance

24×7 card key access

Multiple levels of security

Video surveillance

FM200 fire suppression system

About Web Werks

Web Werks is one of the leading TIER III & TIER
IV Data Center service providers in India and in
the United States in business since 1996 with
five State-of-the-art Data Centers and
remarkable 24x7 Rapid Action Support and
99.995% Uptime Guarantee.
